Title: Authorizes the village of Sodus Point, in the town of Sodus, county of Wayne to allow golf carts on certain streets
Summary: Authorizes the village of Sodus Point, in the town of Sodus, county of Wayne to allow golf carts on certain streets under the exclusive control and jurisdiction of such village.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the village law, in relation to authorizing the village of Sodus Point, in the town of Sodus, county of Wayne to allow golf carts on certain streets
